scripts.say: Diadem of Light
I see, so if I'm understanding this correctly, Nagato dragged herself all the way out here, got lost, and ran into trouble?
Mikasa, if you wanted Nagato to come so badly, you could have prevented all of this if you simply asked her.
I just heard this from Zuikaku earlier. Besides, when Nagato has made her mind to do something, there's nothing we can do to stop her.
However, Akagi... I must say, you look like you're quite enjoying this situation.
Who knows? Everything is more interesting after a few drinks.
Akagi...
In any case, if Nagato is here, then I suppose we won't need Shinano to perform the ritual?
In the first place, Yamashiro was just supposed to be the backup plan...
Ehhhhhhh?!
Yamashiro's tail went rigid with shock.
Y-Yamashiro won't be doing the ritual?!
You'll get to do the next best thing. Even if you don't get to perform the actual ritual, you can still recite blessings and whatnot.
Why don't we give it a try? Hibiki, bring Watatsumi over here.
Y-yes ma'am!
Hibiki dashed out of the building.
Hmm, so this is this the legendary artifact I've heard so much about? The one that can call a ship with no history into existence?
It'd be nice if it could help speed our Plan Z along~
Eugen, have you had a bit much to drink?
I haven't had enough, if anything~ Besides, I was just posing a hypothetical.
I'm sorry, everyone, please ignore what Eugen said.
Hehe, we're all friends here. If you need anything, just let us know, and I'm sure something can be arranged.
Oh my, are you sure about that? We wouldn't mind borrowing that "Watatsumi" of yours in that case. Ahaha~
(whispers) Someone seems to have led wolves into the room...
(whispers) What about Lady Nagato...?
(whispers) We haven't heard anything after Zuikaku's initial communication due to the interference of the Mirror Sea.
(whispers) We'll have to place our faith in her then. Above all, I don't know what Akagi is planning, but we can't let them have Watatsumi.
One divine object, coming through!
Upon hearing her words, the people gathered in the hall turned their eyes to Watatsumi, the atmosphere getting noticeably louder and more tense.
Eugen probably wouldn't be able to sail like this, so I'll take care of her for the time being.
And with that, the others in the hall began to move towards another ceremonial site.
Eugen, are you awake? It's time for us to make our move.
Eugen...?
Good grief...
Did you really get yourself drunk? I suppose we'll have to leave empty-handed...
What a terrifying bunch these Sakura Empire folks are...
